Sentencas: Marine transportation is the main means of transporting massive goods overseas that cannot be transported using rail or aviation.
Titulo: An innovative study on a hybridized ship powering system with fuel cells using hydrogen and clean fuel blends

Sentencas: Using fossil fuels has significantly impacted global warming and changed the climate.
Titulo: An innovative study on a hybridized ship powering system with fuel cells using hydrogen and clean fuel blends

Sentencas: This paper focuses on the development of a new hybridized powering system that uses environmentally benign hydrogen based fuels in five different blends.
Titulo: An innovative study on a hybridized ship powering system with fuel cells using hydrogen and clean fuel blends

Sentencas: The proposed powering system is uniquely designed and consists of an internal combustion engine (ICE), gas turbine (GT), solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), and thermoelectric generators (TEG).
Titulo: An innovative study on a hybridized ship powering system with fuel cells using hydrogen and clean fuel blends

Sentencas: This system is investigated thermodynamically after validating the results with a traditional ICE using marine gas oil (MGO-DMA) fuels.
Titulo: An innovative study on a hybridized ship powering system with fuel cells using hydrogen and clean fuel blends

Sentencas: The two traditional ICE engines produce a net power of 21048 kW with a 22.9 % energy efficiency and a 29.0 % exergy efficiency.
Titulo: An innovative study on a hybridized ship powering system with fuel cells using hydrogen and clean fuel blends

Sentencas: However, the hybridized GT and ICE system can deliver a maximum power of 27773 kW using a dimethyl-ether and hydrogen fuel blend with a percentage increase of 32 %, while the minimum power is obtained to be 24968 kW (an increase of about 19 %) using methane and hydrogen blend.
Titulo: An innovative study on a hybridized ship powering system with fuel cells using hydrogen and clean fuel blends

Sentencas: The addition of SOFC can increase the GT power by double and raise the energy efficiency from 19 % to 32 %.
Titulo: An innovative study on a hybridized ship powering system with fuel cells using hydrogen and clean fuel blends

Sentencas: Blending all five fuels, such as hydrogen, methane, dimethyl ether, methanol and ethanol, can drop the specific fuel consumption to 254.5 g/kWh by 21.7 % and raise the total power to 27719.5 by 31.7 %.
Titulo: An innovative study on a hybridized ship powering system with fuel cells using hydrogen and clean fuel blends

Sentencas: In addition, the carbon emissions are drastically decreased by about 61 % by utilizing sustainable fuel blends; meanwhile, the overall system performance is increased by more than 35 %.
Titulo: An innovative study on a hybridized ship powering system with fuel cells using hydrogen and clean fuel blends
